description: My place is close to Ditmars BLVD Subway Station , MP Taverna, Taverna Kyclades, Starbucks. You’ll love my place because of It's less than a block from the subway!   It's an  actual home furnished to live in, so it feels more comfortable than a generic Airbnb place.  It also has a back terrace.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Comfy 1-Bedroom, Just a block from the Subway!
review: Amazing place!!!!! Extremely clean, very central. Everything as described. Medina was very reachable, and answered all my questions. Will deff stay again if available. Thanks Medina!
